TABLE.NAME: block_townsquare_preferences
TABLE.COMMENT: User Settings of the content filters in townsquare

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User that set personal filter settings

FIELD.NAME: timefilterpast
FIELD.COMMENT: Setting of the time filter, start of the timespan

FIELD.NAME: timefilterfuture
FIELD.COMMENT: Setting of the time filter, end of the timespan

FIELD.NAME: basicletter
FIELD.COMMENT: Setting of the letter filter for basic letters. Always 1 or 0 (on/off)

FIELD.NAME: completionletter
FIELD.COMMENT: Setting of the letter filter for completion letters.

FIELD.NAME: postletter
FIELD.COMMENT: Setting of the letter filter for post letters.
